targets.query: SELECT "value" FROM "XIVHostIO" WHERE "type" = 'riops' AND "HostIO" =~ /$HOST$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY HostIO

SELECT "value" FROM "XIVHostIORH" WHERE "type" = 'wmiops' AND "HostIO" =~ /$HOST$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY HostIO

SELECT "value" FROM "XIVHostBW" WHERE "type" = 'wbandw' AND "HostBW" =~ /$HOST$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY HostBW
SELECT "value" FROM "XIVHostBW" WHERE "type" = 'tbandw' AND "HostBW" =~ /$HOST$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY HostBW

SELECT "value" FROM "XIVHostBWHM" WHERE "type" = 'rhbandw' AND "HostBW" =~ /$HOST$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY HostBW
SELECT "value" FROM "XIVHostBWHM" WHERE "type" = 'wmbandw' AND "HostBW" =~ /$HOST$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY HostBW
SELECT "value" FROM "XIVHostBWHM" WHERE "type" = 'whbandw' AND "HostBW" =~ /$HOST$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY HostBW
SELECT "value" FROM "XIVHostRT" WHERE "type" = 'rlat'  AND "HostRT" =~ /$HOST$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY HostRT
SELECT "value" FROM "XIVHostRT" WHERE "type" = 'wlat' AND "HostRT" =~ /$HOST$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY HostRT
SELECT "value" FROM "XIVHostRTHM" WHERE "type" = 'rhit' AND "HostRT" =~ /$HOST$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY HostRT

SELECT "value" FROM "XIVHPortBW" WHERE "type" = 'tbandw' AND "PortHBW"  =~ /$HOST$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY PortHBW
SELECT "value" FROM "XIVHPortIO" WHERE "type" = 'tiops' AND "PortHIO"  =~ /$HOST$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY PortHIO
SELECT "value" FROM "XIVHPortRT" WHERE "type" = 'wlat' AND "PortHRT" =~  /$HOST$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY PortHRT
SELECT "value" FROM "XIVHPortRT" WHERE "type" = 'rlat' AND "PortHRT" =~ /$HOST$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY ReadLat,PortHRT
SELECT "value" FROM "XIVVolIO" WHERE "type" = 'riops' AND "VolIO" =~ /$Vol$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY VolIO

SELECT "value" FROM "XIVVolBW" WHERE "type" = 'wbandw' AND "VolBW" =~ /$Vol$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY VolBW
SELECT "value" FROM "XIVVolRT" WHERE "type" = 'rlat' AND value >0 AND "VolRT" =~ /$Vol$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY VolRT
SELECT "value" FROM "XIVVolRT" WHERE "type" = 'wlat' AND value >0 AND "VolRT" =~ /$Vol$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY VolRT
SELECT "value" FROM "XIVVolBW" WHERE "type" = 'tbandw' AND "VolBW" =~ /$Vol$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY VolBW
